name: Hopics
review_text: There is a significant lack of coordination at Hopics. There are too many staff members and not enough assistance for the homeless. When you arrive early, Hopics frequently informs you that no beds are available, which has become a recurring issue. Whenever you inquire, they respond that there are no beds. If Hopics cannot provide help for the homeless, what is the purpose of their organization? Additionally, the area surrounding the location is very disturbing and in poor condition.

review_text: the security guard with the synthetic wig always has an attitude and talks to the people in need of service like they are her children and like she‚Äôs above people. she uses foul language and curses in front of the children. the rest of the team are nice but definitely need a more respectful security guard not an entitled one !

name: Hopics
review_text: There was a job specialist named Tyrone that use to work there that help me completely change and elevate my life. I can‚Äôt believe he doesn‚Äôt work there anymore. I basically had to continue the journey without him. If you serious, these people will help you change your life. If you on some bs for a quick come up, don‚Äôt waste your time. This place is for people that have a strong desire to be better and need some guidance.

review_text: I love this place they help the homeless find stability permanent housing you will succeed going here it's the best place not crowded very clean

name: Hopics
review_text: hopics doesn‚Äôt help you find housing . hopics says you have to find your own housing but once you find your own housing as in getting approved for unit  . it‚Äôs takes a whole month to meet a TLS worker . Then Another month to get an inspection date and another month to get payment to landlord. landlords aren‚Äôt willing to hold an apartment with no pay for 3+ more months with no back pay for holding the unit. This process is keeping the less fortunate homeless and in the shelters and that‚Äôs a major problem. i been in the shelters for 8 months . i shouldn‚Äôt be here still if im doing everything that‚Äôs ask of me to get out of this situation for me and my kids and by this process, the landlord is not willing to wait another month after he‚Äôs been waiting 2 to 3 months with no inspection no payment or anything . now me and kids have to start all over again on finding a place which means more days and nights in the shelter . BEWARE THEY WANT TO KEEP YOU HOMELESS IN A SHELTER !! The funding they get for the homeless they are keeping it for self gain .

name: Hopics
review_text: Every Time I‚Äôve been to this homeless help center . I have never received help ! I went once 4 years ago with my daughter and I still had to sleep in my car . So I arrived today 9/20/2024 at 6:30 am ! One person cut me in line and when I got there they said they reached capacity . And could not help me . For starters on google it says they open at 8:00 but they don‚Äôt really open until 8:30am. The security guard is a lady with short red hair and she‚Äôs very controlling and overwhelming ! She keeps using God and yelling as a way to get people to stop talking , telling people to smile in stressful situations and asking people not to have conversations with the other people in the office . I found the security gaurd very disrespectful and this place very unprofessional. If you want help go to Wlcac or another place . If you are not in line at 4-5am you will not be seen they only see the first 15 people in line . So , don‚Äôt even waste your time if you are thinking about funding them find another non profit !

review_text: I was homeless with my children and came to this place they welcomed me and my children with open arms they care about the homeless they will make sure you get housed as long as you show you really need the help and if you have problems in the shelter they will not allow anyone to be mistreated I appreciate hopics for being there for me and if I need them in the future then they might be able to help me again.

name: Hopics

name: Hopics
review_text: Just a little quick help for my fellow homeless families: Your GPS is going to take you to the main building of HOPICS. But if you're looking for shelter or housing for your family. You have to go around the corner to San Pedro Street. That's where the Spa 6 Family Solutions Center is. The main building on Crocker Street is for single men and women with no children.

name: Hopics
review_text: They don't help homeless individuals. You have to have children in order to receive help. They refer you to the other Hopics location by Broadway in which they don't help either. They give you a list of outdated phone numbers to shelters & housing. It's sad!

name: Hopics
review_text: This place won't help you and they'll waste your time. The people that work there are narcissistic and make you feel less than a human being. They should just shut this program down for good!

name: Hopics
review_text: This place is literal trash. The homeless shelters are unsanitary one of the girls was bitten up by bugs and they didn't do anything but blame her and deny it. If you are being threatened by other people in their shelters they allow you to be harassed and beat up even if it's a children and women's shelter. The housing coordinators hit on you and don't want to help you find housing. There is women that have been stuck in the shelters for years and no help from hopics. They also never answer their phones. If you care about your children go to a different family solutions center. They place is as corrupt as it gets.

name: Hopics
review_text: Hard to get ahold of by phone. Gave me the runaround once I was there. "Single persons go to the other side." "Appointments only." "Different location." "No, you were at the right location." "Other side." Finally get my application in, last person of the day when I was originally 5th in line before they had me running all over the place just to end up at the same location, two hours later. Took me a bit to get all the necessary documents, sent them to their email and "should get a confirmation they've been received and you're on the wait list within two days. 2 weeks and several attempted phone calls later, nothing. Will change review if they ever get back to me.
